languages.text: {n}В тени законника бесшумно двигается старуха, в чье тело вмонтированы десятки писчих имплантов и увеличительных стекол. Если бы не живые, пытливые глаза за огромными окулярами, вы бы приняли ее за экзотического сервитора. На ее рясе выделяются священные символы Администратума.{/n}

{n}An old woman walks in the Marshal's shadow, her body fitted with dozens of scribing implants and magnifying instruments. If not for her eyes, quick and inquisitive behind a giant pair of ocular lenses, you might have mistaken her for an exotic servitor. Her robes are adorned with sacred symbols of the Adeptus Administratum.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В тени законника бесшумно двигается старуха, в чье тело вмонтированы десятки писчих имплантов и увеличительных стекол. Если бы не живые, пытливые глаза за огромными окулярами, вы бы приняли ее за экзотического сервитора. На ее рясе выделяются священные символы Администратума.{/n}

{n}An old woman walks in the Marshal's shadow, her body fitted with dozens of scribing implants and magnifying instruments. If not for her eyes, quick and inquisitive behind a giant pair of ocular lenses, you might have mistaken her for an exotic servitor. Her robes are adorned with sacred symbols of the Adeptus Administratum.{/n}

{n}An old woman walks in the Marshal's shadow, her body fitted with dozens of scribing implants and magnifying instruments. If not for her eyes, quick and inquisitive behind a giant pair of ocular lenses, you might have mistaken her for an exotic servitor. The sacred symbols of the Adeptus Administratum on her robes signify that this woman is a prefect holding the esteemed position of Master of Seals.{/n}

{n}An old woman walks in the Marshal's shadow, her body fitted with dozens of scribing implants and magnifying instruments. If not for her eyes, quick and inquisitive behind a giant pair of ocular lenses, you might have mistaken her for an exotic servitor. Her robes are adorned with sacred symbols of the Adeptus Administratum.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une vieille femme s'avance dans l'ombre de l'officier, le corps bardé de dizaines d'implants scripturaux et autres instruments grossissants. Si ce n'étaient ses yeux, vifs et inquisiteurs derrière une paire de lentilles oculaires surdimensionnées, vous l'auriez prise pour un servitor d'un genre à part. Sa robe est ornée des symboles sacrés de l'Adeptus Administratum.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An old woman walks in the Marshal's shadow, her body fitted with dozens of scribing implants and magnifying instruments. If not for her eyes, quick and inquisitive behind a giant pair of ocular lenses, you might have mistaken her for an exotic servitor. Her robes are adorned with sacred symbols of the Adeptus Administratum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une vieille femme s'avance dans l'ombre de l'officier, le corps bardé de dizaines d'implants scripturaux et autres instruments grossissants. Si ce n'étaient ses yeux, vifs et inquisiteurs derrière une paire de lentilles oculaires surdimensionnées, vous l'auriez prise pour un servitor d'un genre à part. Sa robe est ornée des symboles sacrés de l'Adeptus Administratum.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una anciana camina a la sombra del Mariscal, con el cuerpo cargado de implantes de escritura e instrumentos con efecto de lupa. De no ser por sus ojos, rápidos e inquisitivos tras sus enormes gafas, podrías confundirla con un servidor exótico. Su túnica está adornada con los símbolos sagrados del Adeptus Administratum.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An old woman walks in the Marshal's shadow, her body fitted with dozens of scribing implants and magnifying instruments. If not for her eyes, quick and inquisitive behind a giant pair of ocular lenses, you might have mistaken her for an exotic servitor. Her robes are adorned with sacred symbols of the Adeptus Administratum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una anciana camina a la sombra del Mariscal, con el cuerpo cargado de implantes de escritura e instrumentos con efecto de lupa. De no ser por sus ojos, rápidos e inquisitivos tras sus enormes gafas, podrías confundirla con un servidor exótico. Su túnica está adornada con los símbolos sagrados del Adeptus Administratum.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一位老妇人在元帅的影子里向你走来。她浑身上下安装了几十个缮写专用植入物，以及各种各样的放大仪器。若不是因为厚重的镜片后面传来了她敏锐、好奇的视线，你恐怕会把她当成某种充满异域风情的机仆。她的长袍装饰着帝国内政部的神圣印记。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An old woman walks in the Marshal's shadow, her body fitted with dozens of scribing implants and magnifying instruments. If not for her eyes, quick and inquisitive behind a giant pair of ocular lenses, you might have mistaken her for an exotic servitor. Her robes are adorned with sacred symbols of the Adeptus Administratum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一位老妇人在元帅的影子里向你走来。她浑身上下安装了几十个缮写专用植入物，以及各种各样的放大仪器。若不是因为厚重的镜片后面传来了她敏锐、好奇的视线，你恐怕会把她当成某种充满异域风情的机仆。她的长袍装饰着帝国内政部的神圣印记。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine alte Frau, deren Körper mit Dutzenden von Schreibimplantaten und Vergrößerungsinstrumenten übersät ist, folgt dem Marschall. Wären da nicht ihre Augen, die neugierig hinter zwei Okularlinsen funkeln, könnte man sie beinahe für einen exotischen Servitor halten. Ihre Roben sind mit heiligen Symbolen des Adeptus Administratum versehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An old woman walks in the Marshal's shadow, her body fitted with dozens of scribing implants and magnifying instruments. If not for her eyes, quick and inquisitive behind a giant pair of ocular lenses, you might have mistaken her for an exotic servitor. Her robes are adorned with sacred symbols of the Adeptus Administratum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine alte Frau, deren Körper mit Dutzenden von Schreibimplantaten und Vergrößerungsinstrumenten übersät ist, folgt dem Marschall. Wären da nicht ihre Augen, die neugierig hinter zwei Okularlinsen funkeln, könnte man sie beinahe für einen exotischen Servitor halten. Ihre Roben sind mit heiligen Symbolen des Adeptus Administratum versehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}老女が将帥の影の中を歩き、彼女の体には複数のスクライビングインプラントと拡大装置が装着されている。もし巨大な眼鏡の後ろに素早い詮索好きな彼女の目がなかったら、彼女をエキゾチックなサーヴィターと間違えたかもしれない。彼女のローブには帝国行政局の神聖なシンボルがあしらわれていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An old woman walks in the Marshal's shadow, her body fitted with dozens of scribing implants and magnifying instruments. If not for her eyes, quick and inquisitive behind a giant pair of ocular lenses, you might have mistaken her for an exotic servitor. Her robes are adorned with sacred symbols of the Adeptus Administratum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老女が将帥の影の中を歩き、彼女の体には複数のスクライビングインプラントと拡大装置が装着されている。もし巨大な眼鏡の後ろに素早い詮索好きな彼女の目がなかったら、彼女をエキゾチックなサーヴィターと間違えたかもしれない。彼女のローブには帝国行政局の神聖なシンボルがあしらわれていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vücudunda onlarca yazı implantı ve büyütme aleti bulunan yaşlı bir kadın, Miralay'ın gölgesinde yürüyor. Dev bir çift merceğin ardındaki hızlı ve meraklı gözleri olmasa egzotik bir hizmetkâr olduğu sanılabilirmiş. Cübbesi, Adeptus Administratum'un kutsal sembolleriyle süslenmiş.{/n}
